name: OR_LNLG_CDP
description: This table contains the CDP information for the Surgical Log (ORL). CDP stands for Catheter, Drains, and Packings which has been replaced by LDAs (Lines, Drains, and Airways) post Summer 2009.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: CDP_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the type of CDP for the surgical log.

columns.name: CDP_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description: The action taken on the catheter, drain, or packing (CDP).

columns.name: CDP_AREA_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the area in which the CDP was applied.

columns.name: CDP_SIZE
columns.description: The size of the catheter, drain, or packing (CDP).

columns.name: CDP_REMOVAL_DATE
columns.description: The date the CDP was removed.

columns.name: CDP_AMOUNT
columns.description: This column is a numeric value that stores the amount of CDPs. CDPs have been replaced by Lines, Drains, and Airways (LDAs) as of 2009.

columns.name: CDP_UNITS_C_NAME
columns.description: The units of measure category number for the CDP.

columns.name: CDP_INV_LOC_ID
columns.description: This item will store inventory location for the CDPs.

columns.name: CDP_CC_INFLATION
columns.description: Stores the amount, in CCs, needed for inflation.

columns.name: CDP_URINE_RET_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number for the urine returned.
